text: Does anyone know how to get the current language slug (/de /en /fr) in a module?

Hi guys ,quick question, how can I delete a module from this list? I noticed that when I started creating modules with React and deploying them, the ones I deleted locally and deployed again were not removed from HubSpot. Now I see some modules that I had already deleted
any work around to use the new X icon with the icon hubl tag? i dont want to use fontawesome just for one icon

Does anyone know how to have separate headers for separate pages. I am using the interactive theme , and I want to have a CTA button that says sign out on one of private content pages. I am not sure how to do that.

If you are using the HubSpot CLI you can pass the --clean flag when you upload which will delete all remote files and replace them with whats being uploaded

definitely make a backup of the files before you do this.

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/local-development-cli>
If i had to guess, these aren’t an actual icon field but icons used in an image field and the icon “name” is just the alt text. Heres a little example using ted lasso images.
